heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly sunny. Highs in the low to mid 50s, with some upper 40s far north. North to northeast winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear. Areas of fog or freezing fog. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s in northern cold hollows. Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny after any early fog, then clouds increasing late in the far south. Highs in the low to mid 50s. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.
